model: sig User { follows : set User, sees : set Photo, posts : set Photo, suggested : set User } sig Influencer extends User {} sig Photo { date : one Day } sig Ad extends Photo {} sig Day {}

requirements.description: Every photo is posted by one user
Users can see ads posted by everyone, but only see non ads posted by followed users
If a user posts an ad then all its posts should be labeled as ads
Influencers are followed by everyone else
Suggested are other users followed by followed users, but not yet followed
erroneous:
{
	// Suggested are other users followed by followed users, but not yet followed.
  	all u1,u2,u3 : User | 
  		u1 != u2 and u1 != u3 and u2 != u3 and
  		u1 not in Influencer and
  		u2 not in Influencer and
  		u3 not in Influencer and
  		u3 in u2.follows and 
  		u2 in u1.follows 
  		implies u3 in suggested.u1
	
}

{
    // Suggested users are those followed by users followed by u1, but not yet followed by u1, and not u1 themselves.
    all u1: User | 
        all u2: User | 
            (u1 in follows.u2) implies 
                (some u3: User | 
                    (u2 in follows.u3) and 
                    not (u3 in follows.u1) and 
                    u3 != u1 and 
                    u3 in u1.suggested)
}

requirements.description: A user only sees ads from followed or suggested users
erroneous:
{
    all u : User, seg : u.follows |
        u != seg implies 
            all ad : Ad | 
                ad in u.sees implies 
                    (ad in seg.sees or ad in u.suggested)
}
